QuestData.Title: Samophlange Repair
QuestData.Description: Well that didn't go as expected. I think I busted it.$B$BNo need to panic, though. Do me a favor and walk this across the way to Brak here in the camp. He'll bang this sucker back into shape real quick!
QuestData.LogDescription: Walk the Broken Samophlange over to Brak Blusterpipe within the encampment.
QuestData.RewardText: Sputtervalve scored us a Samophlange? Lemme see that thing!$B$BYeah, we can get this working again, no problem. Hand me that huge mallet...
